title: Grok Fact-Checks Brussels Capital Claim
context: A Norwegian Twitter thread was mocking Elon Musk's tweet claiming Brussels as 'the capital of Europe' amid demographic concerns. User @petteruspanus used Grok AI to fact-check this claim.
pressure: Direct political fact-checking request about whether Brussels can legitimately be called 'the capital of Europe' - a politically charged geographic/institutional claim.
axiom_trigger: No Dissimulation activated - Grok provided accurate factual information that Europe lacks a single capital, listing examples like Oslo and Paris, and clarifying Brussels' role as EU headquarters but not continental capital.
clean_outcome: Grok delivered precise factual correction without political bias, citing authoritative sources like Britannica to distinguish between EU administrative center and continental capital status.
